title: Stormont school portraits taking social media by storm
title_page: Stormont school portraits taking social media by storm - BBC News
maintext: "There've been lots of worries and fears being expressed by the children this week - is Christmas going to be okay? Are we going to get our presents? Are we going to see our grandparents? So this has boosted morale for the whole school on what would otherwise have been a fairly bleak morning."
